articles.author: Kate Bartlett
articles.title: Trump's debunked 'burial site' video reopens 'wounds,' says victim's son - NPR
articles.description: Trump's misleading video of a 'burial site' for white South African farmers reopened 'new wounds,' victim's son tells NPR.
articles.content:
JOHANNESBURG President Trump claims a "genocide" of white people, particularly Afrikaner farmers, is taking place in South Africa.
When he met the country's president, Cyril Ramaphosa, in the Oval O… [+4006 chars]
